channel.title: Help Needed... I Moved this
channel.description:
Plz help me on these... 1. How do i make my energy never run out? 2. How can i make myseld a admin? 3. How can i make a npc talk? 4. How can i make a shop from a npc that does not have the trade sign? 5. how do i make it so i dont need runes to use any type of mage? 6. How do i add ancients to the top of the friends list? 7. How do i make Hp for people that are playing like 600 also skills at 200? 8. How do i add snow? 9. How do i make it so it can be a all around pk? If anyone knows these plz post it i need help. *ALSO* I have read you compile tuts and i did what they said and i get this error
The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect Press any key to continue . . .
I put this in and it i got that error..
@echo off title Working Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

item.title: Help Needed... I Moved this
item.dc:creator: @Battleman021 Battleman021
item.description:
@Battleman021 wrote:

Plz help me on these…

  1. How do i make my energy never run out?
  2. How can i make myseld a admin?
  3. How can i make a npc talk?
  4. How can i make a shop from a npc that does not have the trade sign?
  5. how do i make it so i dont need runes to use any type of mage?
  6. How do i add ancients to the top of the friends list?
  7. How do i make Hp for people that are playing like 600 also skills at 200?
  8. How do i add snow?
  9. How do i make it so it can be a all around pk?

If anyone knows these plz post it i need help.

ALSO
I have read you compile tuts and i did what they said and i get this error

The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect
The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect
Press any key to continue . . .

I put this in and it i got that error…

@echo off title Working Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Read full topic
